sen.j: 河田 羆（かわだ たけし、天保13年9月7日 (旧暦)（1842年10月10日） - 大正9年（1920年）1月4日）は、日本の地理学者。
sen.e: Takeshi KAWADA (河田 羆, October 10, 1842 - January 4, 1920) was a Japanese geographer.
Takeshi KAWADA (October 10, 1842 - January 4, 1920) was a Japanese geographer.
sen.cmt: 英訳文から日本語名を削除しました。
sen.e: Takeshi KAWADA (October 10, 1842 - January 4, 1920) was a Japanese geographer.

sen.j: 明治政府の地誌編纂事業に終始尽力した唯一の人物であるが、彼に関する伝記はほぼ皆無に等しく、今日においては殆ど知られていない。
sen.e: He was the only person that made every possible effort at the topography compilation project by Meiji Government from beginning to end, but almost no biography has been written about him, and he is scarcely known in the world now.

He was the only person that made every possible effort at the topography compilation project by Meiji Government from beginning to end, but almost no biography has been written about him, and he is scarcely known in the world now.

He was the only person that made every possible effort at the topography compilation project by Meiji Government from beginning to end, but almost no biography has been written about him, and he is scarcely known in the world now.

sen.j: 佐藤一斎の孫にあたる。
sen.e: He is a grandchild of Issai SATO.
He is a grandchild of Issai SATO.
He is a grandchild of Issai SATO.

sen.j: また田口卯吉の母方の従妹の子にあたる。
sen.e: And he is a child of a cousin on the mother's side of Ukichi TAGUCHI.
And he is a child of a cousin on the mother's side of Ukichi TAGUCHI.
And he is a child of a cousin on the mother's side of Ukichi TAGUCHI.
